tool_description: Manages and enforces communication frequency limits to prevent over-messaging and ensure compliance with customer preferences.

notification_type.description: Type of notification: order_updates, promotions, newsletters, account_alerts

check_only.description: Only check if sending is allowed without logging the attempt

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid notification type: notification_type must be one of: order_updates, promotions, newsletters, account_alerts.
Invalid channel type: channel_type must be one of: email, sms, push.
Frequency limits not configured: No frequency rules found for this customer and notification type combination.
usage: Provide customer_id, notification_type, and channel_type to check frequency limits. Set check_only to true for validation without logging.

can_send.description: Whether the notification can be sent based on frequency rules

next_allowed_time.description: Next time a notification can be sent (date-time format)

messages_sent_today.description: Number of messages sent today for this type

daily_limit.description: Maximum messages allowed per day for this type
